sentences.english: Emotions have direct influences on the quality of calisthenics teaching.
sentences.chinese: 情緒直接影響健美操教學的質量。

sentences.english: First, we wore them tapered for  aerobics.
sentences.chinese: 最初，我們穿着它上健美操課。

sentences.english: Learn the hop it back hip hop dance move in this free aerobic dancing video from a choreographer.
sentences.chinese: 學習回來跳健美操在此免費視頻從編舞嘻哈舞步。

sentences.english: The callisthenics CAI courseware is a valid assistance to the callisthenics teaching.

sentences.english: The development and the popularization of body-building exercises movement has been almost 30 years in our country.
sentences.chinese: 健美操運動在我國的開展與普及已經將近三十年了。

sentences.english: Next month I do aerobics on Saturdays and Tai Chi on Mondays.
sentences.chinese: 下個月每逢星期六我將練健美操，星期一練太極拳。

sentences.english: That tri-weekly commitment to aerobics class?
sentences.chinese: 這每週三次的健美操課能給你承諾？

sentences.english: Collisthnics has already become a popular subject for sports specialty in the teacher training school.
sentences.chinese: 我國健美操已列入師專體育專業的普修課程。

sentences.english: As a result, aerobics is my favorite sport.
sentences.chinese: 因此，健美操是我最喜愛的一種運動。

sentences.english: How to carry out quality-oriented education in callisthenics teaching;
sentences.chinese: 健美操運動在我國的開展與普及已經將近三十年了。

sentences.english: I do aerobics once a week.

sentences.english: This article refers the multi-intelligent theory to aerobics curriculum reform.
sentences.chinese: 本文借鑑多元智能理論對健美操課程進行探討研究。
